verses.verse: You are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> you shall not <S%H1413>cut<s%> <S%H7760>yourselves,<s%> nor make any <S%H7144>baldness<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

For you are a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> for his own <S%H5459>possession,<s%> above all <S%H5971>peoples<s%> who are <S%H6440>on<s%> the face of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> any abominable <S%H8441>thing.<s%>
These are the <S%H929>animals<s%> which you may <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H7794>ox,<s%> the <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and the <S%H5795>goat,<s%>

the <S%H354>hart,<s%> and the <S%H6643>gazelle,<s%> and the <S%H6643>roebuck,<s%> and the wild <S%H689>goat,<s%> and the <S%H1788>ibex,<s%> and the <S%H8377>antelope,<s%> and the <S%H2169>chamois.<s%>

Every <S%H929>animal<s%> that <S%H6536>parts<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and has the <S%H6541>hoof<s%> <S%H8157>cloven<s%> <S%H8156>in<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H5927>chews<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> among the <S%H929>animals,<s%> that may you <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Nevertheless these you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or of those who have <S%H6536>the<s%> <S%H6541>hoof<s%> <S%H8156>cloven:<s%> the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> and the <S%H768>hare,<s%> and the <S%H8227>rabbit;<s%> because they <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> but <S%H6536>don't<s%> part the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> they are unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>

The <S%H2386>pig,<s%> because it has a <S%H6536>split<s%> <S%H6541>hoof<s%> but <S%H1625>doesn't<s%> chew the cud, is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to <S%H1320>you:<s%> of their flesh you shall not <S%H398>eat,<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> you shall not <S%H5060>touch.<s%>
These you may <S%H398>eat<s%> of all that are in the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> whatever has <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> may you <S%H398>eat;<s%>
and whatever <S%H5579>doesn't<s%> have fins and <S%H7193>scales<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat;<s%> it is unclean to <S%H2931>you.<s%>
Of all <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>
But these are they of which you shall not <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and the <S%H6538>vulture,<s%> and the <S%H5822>osprey,<s%>
and the red <S%H344>kite,<s%> and the <S%H344>falcon,<s%> and the <S%H344>kite<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
and every <S%H6158>raven<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
and the <S%H1323>ostrich,<s%> and the <S%H1323>owl,<s%> and the <S%H7828>seagull,<s%> and the <S%H8464>hawk<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
the little <S%H3563>owl,<s%> and the great <S%H3244>owl,<s%> and the horned <S%H8580>owl,<s%>
and the <S%H6893>pelican,<s%> and the <S%H7360>vulture,<s%> and the <S%H7994>cormorant,<s%>
and the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> and the <S%H601>heron<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H1744>hoopoe,<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
All <S%H5775>winged<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to <S%H398>you:<s%> they shall not be eaten.
Of all <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>birds<s%> you may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of anything that dies of <S%H5038>itself:<s%> you may <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> living among you who is within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4376>it;<s%> or you may sell it to a <S%H5237>foreigner:<s%> for you are a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a young <S%H1423>goat<s%> in its <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

You shall <S%H6237>surely<s%> <S%H6237>tithe<s%> all the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that which comes <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H4643>there,<s%> the tithe of your <S%H1715>grain,<s%> of your new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock;<s%> that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3117>always.<s%>

If the <S%H1870>way<s%> is too <S%H7235>long<s%> for <S%H3588>you,<s%> so that you are not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H4725>it,<s%> because the place is too <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3068>you,<s%> which Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3068>there,<s%> when Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> shall bless <S%H1288>you;<s%>

then you shall <S%H5414>turn<s%> it into <S%H3701>money,<s%> and bind <S%H6696>up<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%>

and you shall <S%H5414>bestow<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> for whatever your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desires,<s%> for <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> or for <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> or for <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or for strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> or for whatever your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> of <S%H398>you;<s%> and you shall eat there <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> you and your <S%H1004>household.<s%>
The <S%H3881>Levite<s%> who is within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> you shall not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H2506>him;<s%> for he has no portion nor inheritance with <S%H5159>you.<s%>

At the <S%H7097>end<s%> of every <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> all the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H8393>increase<s%> in the same <S%H8141>year,<s%> and shall lay it <S%H3240>up<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%>

and the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> because he has no <S%H2506>portion<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with <S%H1616>you,<s%> and the foreigner living among <S%H3490>you,<s%> and the fatherless, and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> who are within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> which you <S%H6213>do.<s%>
